official_title: To provide for the establishment of a program to prevent the spread of, and ultimately eradicate, the brown tree snake from American Pacific islands.
short_title: Brown Tree Snake Control and Eradication Act

summary.text: Brown Tree Snake Control and Eradication Act - Requires the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service to design and implement a program to control the spread of, and ultimately eradicate, the brown tree snake from the American Pacific islands. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Brown Tree Snake Control and Eradication Act
To provide for the establishment of a program to prevent the spread of, and ultimately eradicate, the brown tree snake from American Pacific islands.
